text:
="preserve">The University of Massachusetts Amherst (UMass Amherst, UMass) is a university in Amherst, Massachusetts. UMass Amherst has an annual enrollment of about 1,300 faculty members and more than 30,000 students.
The university offers academic degrees in 109 undergraduate, 77 master's and 48 doctoral programs.
According to the National Science Foundation, UMass spent $211 million on research and development in 2018, ranking it 111th in the nation.
